716423f-a.text:
127 Ave. B., at the N.E. corner of East 8th Street. Building shown was, prior to 1922, used by the Children's Aid Society. At present (1936) it houses the Talmud Torah Darchei Noam, a Jewish School.

September 31, 1928

P. L. Sperr.

716422f-a.title: ??Manhattan: Avenue B - 8th Street
716422f-a.text:
(1)
Avenue B at S. E. corner of 8th Street, showing St. Brigid's Roman Catholic Church.

August 31, 1928

P. L. Sperr, Photographer.
Neg # 2970

(2)
St. Brigid's Roman Catholic Church, Avenue B at S. E. corner of 8th Street.

April 26, 1935

P. L. Sperr, Photographer.

716422f-b.title: ??Manhattan: Avenue B - 8th Street
716422f-b.text:
(1)
Avenue B at S. E. corner of 8th Street, showing St. Brigid's Roman Catholic Church.

August 31, 1928

P. L. Sperr, Photographer.
Neg # 2970

(2)
St. Brigid's Roman Catholic Church, Avenue B at S. E. corner of 8th Street.

April 26, 1935

P. L. Sperr, Photographer.

723557f-c.text:
(1)
Tompkins Square: A northeastward view across the northeasterly corner of same, showing the wading pool in the central-easterly half. Buildings shown face on the east side of Ave. B, north from East 9th (right) to 10th (left) Streets, prominent of which is the Christodoro House at the N.E. corner of the first two points.
August 31, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
(2 A. 3)
A aet of 2 views of the same pool. No. E is due east to Ave. B at East 8th Street and showing St. Brigids Roman Catholic Church at the S.E. corner of Mame. No. 3 is in the opposite direction, westward to
Ave. A.
July 24, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
